TextView.android:text: 8-10x 15kg Muscle Ups ---> 15x 15kg Straight Bar Dips ---> 15x 15kg Pull Ups
x1 Set (3 mins rest)

x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)

x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)

x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)

x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 120kg Squats
x3 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 100kg Front Squats
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)

x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Glute Ham Raises ---> Max 80kg One-Legged Calf Raises
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)

x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5x 10kg Ring Muscle Ups ---> 8x 10kg Ring Dips ---> 8x 10kg Ring Pull Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 seconds Front Lever (On Rings) ---> 1x L-Sit Muscle Up (Repeat as many times without letting go off the rings)
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max V-Sit Hold
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
6-8x 60kg Pull Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5x 40kg Pull Ups ---> 10x 20kg Pull Ups ---> 10 Pull Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Muscle Ups
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
6 seconds Human Flag
x6 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
8x 100kg Front Squats ---> 10x 40kg Bulgarian Split Squats (E/S)
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30x 50kg Squats ---> 1 min Wall Sit with 50kg
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 10kg Pistol Squats (E/S) ---> Max 60kg One-Legged Calf Raises
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Advanced Program Level 3 - Week 3
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
This workout must be repeated until 10 reps of 15kg Muscle Ups can be done without breaking the set.
